import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; function LoginPage({login, logout}) { let [details, setDetails] = useState({ userName: "", password: ""}) let submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); login(details) } return (

Welcome Back!

{setDetails({...details, userName: e.target.value})}} value={details.username} placeholder="Enter username..." required>
{setDetails({...details, password: e.target.value})}} value={details.password} id="exampleInputPassword" placeholder="Password">
New Registration
Forget password
) } export default LoginPage
